meanings.definition: Animals living in a natural environment, not domesticated
meanings.sent1: I love watching wildlife documentaries on TV.
meanings.sent2: The national park is home to a variety of wildlife.
meanings.sent3: The wildlife in the forest had a meeting to discuss the upcoming winter.
meanings.sent4: The wildlife of the savannah danced under the moonlit sky.
meanings.sent5: The wildlife in the jungle seemed to hum with energy and life.

meanings.definition: The native flora and fauna of a region
meanings.sent1: The wildlife in this area includes both plants and animals.
meanings.sent2: Conservation efforts aim to protect the local wildlife.
meanings.sent3: The wildlife of the garden decided to throw a party for the bees.
meanings.sent4: The wildlife of the desert painted the landscape with vibrant colors.
meanings.sent5: The wildlife of the mountains whispered tales of ancient times.
